snp2.12:10.3: _Kāmakāro_: “wish-granter”. Ordinary people cannot simply get what they want.
snp2.12:10.4: _Saṅkheyyakāro_: “comprehensibility-granter”. _Saṅkheyya_ is “calculable, comprehensible”, not “after comprehension”. The Buddha has a gift for explaining things in a way that makes them comprehensible.
